Text: Good picture quality but there is a really annoying voice over.

The polish overdubbing is horrendous.  You can still hear the german language.  It's like trying to listen to two people of different languages talking to you at the same time while you're trying to read the subtitles.
Any other comments on this torrent? Worthwhile to get?
good if you can stand 2 different languages speaking to you while you read the english subtitles

Aww, yuck! that's it! I'd rather buy the english DVD. The German language is left alone on that. There's no such thing as English dub - too much is lost in translation, as there are a lot of German idioms that don't translate well without sounding complicated.

Constantin Film verschickt massenhaft Abmahnungen an private Filesharer im Internet und fordert 800 Euro Schadensersatz. Die Telekom und andere ISPs sollen anhand von IP-Adressen die Kundendaten herausgegeben haben.
